editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Energy Drink is a globally recognized favorite among action sports athletes, busy professionals, university students, and travelers on long journeys

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Red Bull Sugarfree is a Red Bull energy drink, but it contains no sugar

editions.name: The Summer Edition
editions.flavor_description: Wings for your summer!! Here is the Red Bull Summer Edition energy drink, with White Peach taste, a twist of citrus peel and a floral finish

editions.name: The Blue Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Blue Edition with the seductive fruity taste of Juneberry
editions.alt_text: Red Bull The Sea Blue Edition - Image

editions.name: The Apricot Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull Apricot Edition creates a perfect combination with the blend of Apricot and Strawberry notes, and a hint of Peach taste

editions.name: The Summer Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Summer Edition with the exotic taste of Curuba complemented by the refreshing notes of Elderflower

editions.name: The White Edition
editions.flavor_description: The Red Bull White Edition in the taste of exotic Coconut and juicy Blueberry
